raw akas.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
The Real Housewives of New Jersey

akas: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (original title)
The Real Housewives of New Jersey USA
akas from release info: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (original title)
The Real Housewives of New Jersey USA

1.title: Wives and Misdemeanors

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: With less than a year left in Joe's prison sentence, Teresa comes into her own and decides to enter a bodybuilding competition; Margaret feels the effects of aging; Dolores struggles to forgive Frank; Melissa celebrates her birthday.

2.title: Easter Wives Hunt

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Dolores hosts a hatchet-throwing party, giving the ladies a chance to take out their aggressions; Teresa re-ignites the Gorga/Giudice feud; Margaret prepares for an important business trip as her mother gets ready for a facelift.

3.title: The Jersey Breakfast Club

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: As tensions mount between Melissa and Teresa, all the ladies head out to a cattle ranch in Oklahoma; Jackie shares shocking personal details; Melissa reveals a family secret, leading Teresa to explode and forcing all the ladies to choose sides.

4.title: Housewives & Heifers

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: As their Oklahoma trip continues, the ladies compete in a cattle show; Margaret's husband takes care of an increasingly demanding Marge Sr.; Jennifer insults Margaret's friend, Polly, causing Margaret to lose her cool.

5.title: Turkish Delights

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Teresa and Joe Gorga spar over their father. Jackie defends Melissa, igniting Teresa's famous temper and shocking the entire group with a surprising accusation.

6.title: Last Fling Before the Ring

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: While Dolores catches Frank in another lie, Jackie considers reconciling with her sister. With her wedding on the horizon, Danielle's bridezilla ways leads to an explosive confrontation.

7.title: Brunch Gone Bad

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Margaret's attempts to reconcile the group by hosting a brunch leads to an even bigger blow up. Teresa, Melissa, Joe Gorga, and Margaret head out to Danielle's wedding, but with tensions between Teresa and her brother at an all-time high, Melissa worries their family drama could ruin Danielle's special day.

8.title: Bridezilla of Bimini

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Tensions between Margaret and Danielle rise as Danielle's wedding demands drive Margaret wild. As Jennifer's family celebrates her brother's engagement, Jackie meets with Dolores to try to understand what makes Teresa tick.

9.title: Communion and Confession

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: The feud between Teresa and Jackie threatens to upset little Joey's communion. Jennifer is offended when she discovers that Jackie has written an article about her family and Dolores enlists Margaret's help to plan an event for the homeless shelter she volunteers. Meanwhile, Milania expresses interests in a rapping career, as she copes with her detained father.

10.title: From Turkey with Love

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: As Jennifer departs for Turkey to celebrate her brother's engagement, Danielle sends Margaret a text that could end their forever friendship. Dolores hosts a charity event for women in needs of pampering and Melissa finds out how Joe really feels about their daughter Antonia taking over the family business.

11.title: Whine Country

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: Jackie hosts a trip to a local vineyard for some much-needed bonding time. But when Jennifer attacks Jackie for writing an article about her family, Margaret gets involved and calls Jennifer's brother's fiancé a "mail order bride". Later, things start to heat up when Teresa throws a song release party for Milania.

12.title: Mudslinging in Mexico

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: Teresa's fitness competition is finally here, but not everything that glitters is gold when Melissa makes a surprising discovery about her parents' marriage. As the ladies take off for Cabo for some fun in the sun, tensions between Margaret and Danielle threaten to ruin the entire trip.

13.title: Camels, Cabo and Catfights

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: As the Cabo trip continues, Teresa reveals her true feelings about Joe returning home. Meanwhile, the ladies are forced to take sides when Margaret throws out shocking accusations about Jennifer while Danielle tries to get Teresa on her good side.

14.title: Heroines in Heels

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: After a night of confrontations and one broken glass, the ladies come back home to NJ with a clear division between the group. As Margaret prepares for her Hospital Heroes event, Melissa continues to search for answers about her father, and Jackie's decision to reconcile with her sister comes to a head. The group looks to find its footing as Melissa, Margaret, and Dolores all try to convince Teresa that Danielle is no good.

15.title: Hotheads and Hookahs

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: Dolores makes an important decision about Frank. Melissa's search for her sister leads to a shocking discovery. Jennifer's anniversary party becomes the site of a final group showdown as the ladies try to convince Teresa to remove Danielle from their social circle.

16.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: Part one of the reunion kicks off when Margaret and Jennifer enter a heated game of words when they address their ongoing conflict this season. Jackie is in the hot seat when Teresa accuses her of having ulterior intentions about joining the show and makes it clear that she will never forgive what Jackie said about her husband.

17.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: Part two airs with Jackie and Teresa's argument boiling over. The reunion becomes a family affair when Joe Gorga joins Melissa on the couch to defend themselves against Teresa's accusations. Meanwhile, Jennifer is forced to defend her parenting and her marriage. Teresa shocks Andy and the ladies when she reveals her true feelings about Joe Giudice's deportation.

1.title: Thicker Than Water

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: It's all about family and friends in this first episode of "The Real Housewives of New Jersey." Meet Caroline, Danielle, Dina, Jacqueline and Teresa - five of the most affluent and drama-filled women in the garden state.

2.title: Mama Knows Best

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Not only are the ladies bringing out the drama, but the kids are piling it on too. Jacqueline is upset over her daughter's declining grades, while Teresa and her daughter Gia receive some exciting news about an upcoming audition.

3.title: Not One of Us

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: For the New Jersey housewives, being fabulous is all about being a great mom and a great friend, but when Danielle invites all the ladies over for a Mom's Night Out Spa Party - the party goes from fabulous to frightening.

4.title: Black & White and Read All Over

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Teresa is busy juggling her daughter's acting career while trying to move her family into their dream home. When the ladies decide to get together to discuss Danielle's shady past, Jacqueline takes it upon herself to confront Danielle.

5.title: Casinos and C-Cups

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Dina, Caroline and Teresa head to Atlantic City for a girls' weekend of gambling, shopping and spa treatments. After bikini shopping and an argument with her husband about "the bigger the better," Teresa struggles with the idea of getting plastic surgery.

6.title: Finale

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: The tension between the ladies has been mounting all season and in the season finale, it's all out on the table. All five housewives attend Teresa's end of the year party and the night turns ugly as shocking secrets come out and alliances are revealed.

7.title: The Last Supper

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: It was a dinner unlike any other. The finale of "The Real Housewives of New Jersey" was one of the most heated finales in Bravo history, but if you thought the drama was over, guess again.

8.title: Reunion: Watch What Happens Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: The ladies sit down with Bravo's Andy Cohen, for part one of this explosive reunion special.

9.title: Reunion: Watch What Happens Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: A reunion special so juicy it needed two episodes -- watch what happens as the Jersey girls finally let it all out on the table.

10.title: The Lost Footage

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: Bravo's Andy Cohen unveils unseen footage from the season including fun Napa moments and how Jacqueline and Chris fell in love. Check out even more reunion drama including Teresa's explanation of her magazine apologies to the women and behind-the-scenes with Kim D.

1.title: Water Under the Table

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Everyone's favorite Jersey Girls are back for a brand new season of even bigger drama. The family is as thick as thieves, and Danielle is still trying to make her way into their inner circle. The birth of Jacqueline's baby boy brings the Manzo sisters even closer together, and when Caroline throws her annual Sheriff's Fundraiser and doesn't invite Danielle, Danielle makes sure that everyone knows she was excluded.

2.title: Generation Vexed

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: While family is the most important thing to these Jersey housewives, it's also the source of lots of drama. Jacqueline and her daughter Ashley continue to butt heads over Ashley's bad girl behavior. When Caroline's daughter's boyfriend causes a riff in the Manzo clan, Caroline does her best to stay away and let her babies work it out themselves. Meanwhile, Teresa and Danielle's daughters are both invited to model in the upcoming NYC Fashion Week, and in an effort to move forward and focus on the positive, Danielle extends an olive branch to her former friends to ...

3.title: Catty-Walk

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: The Jersey drama continues when Danielle accuses Jacqueline of not being her own woman. Tired of all the negativity, Dina makes a date with a Zen Expert to purge Danielle from her life. Meanwhile, a very pregnant Teresa and a very determined Danielle see their daughters modeling in Fashion Week.

4.title: Babies, Bubbles and Bubbies

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: The big day finally arrives for Teresa and Joe as they welcome their fourth bambino into the world. Meanwhile, Chris Manzo scores big when he gets an inside look into his dream business, and Jacqueline gets a peek into her husband's secret safe. As the Brownstone prepares for a big night, Danielle gets an invitation she can't refuse, but makes sure to get "back-up" from an old friend before she RSVPs.

5.title: Into the Lion's Den

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Baby Audriana is home from the hospital and although Teresa and Joe couldn't be happier with their fourth princess, Teresa pleads with Joe to get "snipped." Meanwhile, Jacqueline and Ashley are still struggling to get along, but in true Manzo form, Caroline's kids reach out and try to bridge the gap. After a heartfelt invitation to a charity event at the Brownstone, Danielle calls in some favors as she prepares to walk into the lion's den one more time.

6.title: It's Not Me, It's You

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: After the outburst at the Brownstone, another battle breaks out, but this time via Facebook, when Danielle accuses Jacqueline's teenage daughter of threatening her life. Wanting to put an end to the drama, Jacqueline and Teresa confront Ashley about the alleged attacks. Surrounded by all of this negative energy, Dina decides to follow her energist's advice and sets up a face-to-face meeting with Danielle to officially cut her out of her life.

7.title: Play at Your Own Risk

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Danielle, feeling empowered after standing up to the Manzo clan, decides it's time to live again. With the help of her "loyal friends" (and a few moves from her professional past), Danielle brings sexy back. Dina can't deal with the constant fighting, and makes a big decision that changes everything.

8.title: Bubbies Gone Bad

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Everyone knows Danielle has had a hard past, but she finally takes matters into her own hands and goes under the knife to fix one of her biggest issues. Meanwhile, Teresa rolls out the red carpet for her long awaited housewarming party as Caroline deals with family issues when golden boy Albie faces big rejection.

9.title: Posche Spite

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Teresa and Jacqueline get an invitation they just can't refuse, but worlds collide and tempers flare as they are face to face with Danielle for the first time.

10.title: Country Clubbed

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: The brawl between Teresa, Jacqueline and Danielle takes an ugly turn and the police are called in to put an end to this hair-raising feud.

11.title: Staub Wounds

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: The law does not seem to be on anyone's side on "The Real Housewives of New Jersey", as Danielle, reeling from the hair-pull heard 'round the world,' seeks her day in court and Jacqueline struggles to get Ashley to face the seriousness of her actions. Meanwhile, Albie grows anxious about his career as a lawyer.

12.title: Youth Will Be Served

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: Teresa and Joe celebrate their 10-year anniversary in true Giudice style. Meanwhile, Ashley gets a surprise in the mail that just adds to her stress. Danielle tries to focus on the positive by planning her daughter Christine's Sweet 16, but will her ex-husband be a no-show and ruin the festivities?

13.title: Don't Drink the Holy Water

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: Dina returns to fulfill her Godmother duties as Teresa and Joe spare no expense for baby Audriana's fabu-licious Christening. But while the Manzo's and Giudice's are all celebrating, Danielle discovers that one of her closest confidants is a real mole and all hell breaks loose.

14.title: The Chanels of Venice

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: A very public DUI has all the tongues in town wagging. In an effort to escape all the drama, Teresa, Caroline, Jacqueline and their families embark on a cruise to Italy and a whirlwind tour through the homeland. Unfortunately their efforts to escape the insanity backfire, as they find out that traveling with three generations of families is anything but relaxing.

15.title: Hills Are Alive with Giudice

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: The Italy extravaganza continues as Teresa and Joe give everyone an all-out tour of their hometown, complete with hordes of relatives and a family dinner like only the Giudice's can create. Not to be outdone, Danielle meets with a private investigator in an effort to reconnect with her own family roots, and finds that sometimes blood is not thicker than water.

16.title: The Heads of Family Will Roll

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: The ladies are back on Jersey's shores and are determined to put Danielle out of their lives for good. An emotional dinner at Teresa's leads to a commitment from Caroline and an invitation Danielle cannot turn down. The showdown that everyone was waiting for finally takes place - Caroline and Danielle face off, but this time there are no books, no family, no distractions and nowhere to run.

17.title: Reunion: Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: Bravo dishes out the drama for fans of "The Real Housewives of New Jersey" when everyone's favorite Jersey ladies reunite during the first part of the season two reunion special. Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, the reunion will bring Teresa Giudice, Caroline Manzo, Jacqueline Laurita and Danielle Staub together again.

18.title: Reunion: Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

18.plot: Bravo gives fans of "The Real Housewives of New Jersey" an extra helping of drama when everyone's favorite Jersey ladies reunite during the second part of the season two reunion special. Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, the reunion will bring Teresa Giudice, Caroline Manzo, Jacqueline Laurita and Danielle Staub together again.

1.title: In the Name of the Father

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: The premiere episode ushers in the drama as the newest housewives, Melissa (Teresa's sister-in-law) and Kathy (Teresa's cousin) prepare for a family christening. Jacqueline's feeling of guilt and frustration boil over when her lunch with Ashley goes sour. A baby's blessed day becomes a nightmare when Teresa and her family arrive at the reception.

2.title: Drop Dead Gorgas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Tricks, treats, and tension rule the day when Halloween plays backdrop to the fallout from Melissa's christening gone bad. Jacqueline attempts to reason with Teresa when the infamous Posche Fashion Show makes its way to the Brownstone. The catwalk becomes the stage for drama when Kathy speaks her mind and gets a dose of Caroline's house rules.

3.title: Sealed with a Diss

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Jacqueline is forced to confront the past when her damaged relationship with Ashley opens up old wounds. Caroline's boys finally leave the nest but a surprise roommate and shocking announcement from Lauren set the stage for the drama to come. Teresa takes the first steps toward reconciliation with Melissa and her brother, Joe, while Kathy attempts to convince Caroline that she's not the troublemaker in the group.

4.title: Gobblefellas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: It is turkey time in New Jersey and resentment and regret are on the menu. The housewives divide as Teresa hosts a "Friendsgiving" for Jacqueline and Caroline's families and the Gorga's have their own feast with the Wakile's. Spending the holiday apart leaves Melissa and Kathy to wonder how they can bring the family back together.

5.title: Stick It

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Melissa's life hits a high note as she lives out her dream of being a mother and pop star. Caroline attempts to take her motherly advice to the air waves while Jacqueline attempts to tune out Ashley's latest ploy to get a car. An unexpected phone call puts Teresa and her brother face to face for the first time since the Christening.

6.title: Whine and Dine

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: While Caroline serves up advice on her new radio show, the Gorga siblings table their issues in a sit down that opens fresh wounds. Kathy gets in Melissa's corner and Jacqueline mediates when round two of this family face off brings Teresa and Melissa to the Laurita doorstep.

7.title: Teresa's Got a Gun

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: After Teresa and Melissa attempt to bury the bedazzled hatchet, the Giuduce's, Laurita's, and Manzo's retreat to the Catskills for some guns and group prayer. Back in Jersey, Kathy kicks her cooking up a notch and goes restaurant shopping while Melissa gears up for a holiday dance recital that sets the stage for family reunion, sans Teresa.

8.title: Holidazed and Confused

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: The holidays in New Jersey are off to a less than peaceful start when tensions brew between Caroline's children and Kathy and Melissa find out if they have what it takes to be more than housewives. Jacqueline's holiday party sets the stage for new friendships between Melissa and the other ladies. Teresa and Joe try to keep the flame alive behind closed doors, while their financial woes play out in public.

9.title: Twas the Fight Before Christmas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Santa Claus is coming to New Jersey but there's no silent night when Melissa's holiday party whips everyone's tinsel into a tizzy. Kathy hopes to play nice with Teresa, but when the naughty Kim G attempts to stir the punch, the Manzo clan circles their sleighs.

10.title: There Arose Such a Clatter

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: The Manzo's have had it up to their tinsel with Kim G. when Chris Manzo finds himself caught between his family and loyalty to his oldest friend. Teresa and Kathy deck their halls in preparation for their dueling Christmas parties. Melissa and her husband make a decision that leaves Teresa with a blue Christmas.

11.title: A Very Jersey Christmas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: Visions of sugarplums dance in the housewives' heads on Christmas morning. Santa brings all the women something nice but it's Caroline who gets something long overdue. Melissa deems herself the luckiest girl in Jersey while Teresa's Christmas ends on a sour note.

12.title: Auld Lang Syne for an Eye

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: It's a New Year and new beginnings for the housewives. Teresa stirs up trouble with her new cookbook while Melissa lives out her dream from the comfort of her home. Caroline's daughter Lauren pledges to lose weight in the new year while Jacqueline continues to worry about her daughter, Ashley. The annual Brownstone New Year's Eve party sets the stage for backstabbing and bold resolutions as the clock ticks toward midnight.

13.title: Child's Play No More

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: When Teresa and Melissa get their girls together for a play date it proves that adults don't always play as nice as the kids. Kathy and Rich decide that nature has blessed their daughter, but who's going to nurture her about "what boys want?" Meanwhile, Ashley gets a surprise visit from her father...only to realize both parents have more than a family reunion in mind.

14.title: Belly Up & Up

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: Jacqueline's relationship with Ashley hangs in the balance when their war of words brings her to a heartbreaking decision. Teresa's financial problems grow when a visit with her lawyer reveals a giant new debt. All of the housewives head to Kathy's house for a food tasting where Caroline gives Kathy more than rave reviews. When Teresa and Melissa threaten to wreck the party, Kathy's surprise guests shake things up.

15.title: Black as Ink

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: Caroline brims with pride when her sons, Chris and Albie, announce their plans to get rich by selling black water. Jacqueline tries to mask the pain when the grand opening for Lauren's cosmetic business brings her and her daughter Ashley face to face. Kathy hits the hookah with Jacqueline, Caroline and Melissa, meanwhile Teresa cries over spilled ink when her brother finally attends her book signing.

16.title: Singing in the Pain

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: The ladies trade in their heels for running shoes for a charity race that brings out Teresa's competitive side. Melissa debuts her song to a tough crowd in Hoboken. Teresa throws a birthday party for her daughter Milania, but Gia's surprise gift leaves the housewives speechless.

17.title: Get to the Punta!

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: The ladies leave Jersey for paradise as they travel to Punta Cana. Teresa gives Caroline and Al a VIP ticket to her sexy fashion show before the entire gang heads out on their private cruise. It's all bikinis, beer and booze until Kathy and Teresa come to blows on the beach.

18.title: Blood is Thicker Than Guccis

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

18.plot: While the ladies dodge the dead animals that line the open air market, the guys bust balls on the course.

19.title: An Inconvenient Truce

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

19.plot: The streets of Punta Cana are treacherous in heels. While the ladies dodge the dead animals that line the open air market the guys bust balls on the course. Back in Jersey, Ashley makes memories that will last forever... at the tattoo shop. All the housewives come together for the launch of Chris and AlbieÃ.s BLK water and a performance that puts MelissaÃ.s singing talents "on display."

20.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

20.plot: Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, part one brings Caroline Manzo, Teresa Giudice, Melissa Gorga and Kathy Wakile to discuss some of the most talked about antics of the season.

21.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

21.plot: Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, part two brings Caroline Manzo, Teresa Giudice, Melissa Gorga and Kathy Wakile to answer some of viewers most burning questions.

23.title: Portrait of an Italian Family

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

23.plot: Teresa and Melissa bring the family together for a photo that is sure to be worth a thousand words. Kathy makes a decision that shocks her family as Jacqueline and a surprise visitor attempt to salvage hers. Teresa's cookbook hits stands and the rest of the Housewives are none too pleased with some of the "recipes."

0.title: First Look

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: High Tide, Low Blow

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: The Real Housewives of New Jersey are back and things in the Garden State are not coming up roses. Questions as to Jacqueline's absence from the season three reunion are answered. Caroline struggles to fix her friendship with Teresa and receives a long-feared health diagnosis. Jacqueline's daughter, Ashley, has overstayed her welcome at home, resulting in a shocking ultimatum. Tempers flare between Teresa and her brother, Joe, when their families head down to the Jersey Shore. Melissa tries to bring her family back together, but hurtful accusations threaten to destroy...

2.title: Poker Face

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Kathy continues to overprotect her children when she tries to shield her son from an admirer. Ashley gets a lift to the airport, but leaving the nest proves harder than she thought. Meanwhile, Caroline struggles to help with Lauren's growing insecurity over her weight and Melissa cooks up a musical surprise for Joe. At Jacqueline's poker night, Teresa's attempt to apologize for her cook book turns into a brawl that leaves one husband with a black eye and a sore ego.

3.title: Third Eye Blind

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: There is trouble on the high seas when the housewives' cruise down the Jersey coast is filled with gossip about Caroline and smack talk between Kathy and Teresa. Melissa's anger over being called a gold digger finally simmers over at a Summer Solstice party, leaving Jacqueline to play referee when the sisters-in-law face off.

4.title: Drowning Pool

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Caroline celebrates her anniversary with Al, but it's her sons' surprise purchase that leaves her speechless. Jacqueline struggles to deal with Ashley's new life in Las Vegas as Kathy hosts a pool party that plays back drop to a blow out between Teresa and her brother, Joe.

5.title: Spoiled Sports

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Secret insecurities are revealed when Caroline's daughter, Lauren, hits the driving range with her dad to discuss her weight loss. Jacqueline hosts a family field day that has everyone picking sides.

6.title: Uncivil Union

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: It's a party Manzo style when Caroline's brother, Jaime, announces that he's finally getting married to his partner, Rich, of 13 years. The event brings Caroline, Teresa, and Jacqueline together, but their fragile friendship shows some major cracks when Teresa's husband, Joe, makes a joke that goes too far.

7.title: True Love, True Lies

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: It's a wedding to remember and a friendship to forget when just hours before her brother's ceremony, Caroline reads what Teresa really thinks of her. Meanwhile, Melissa hosts her own party and debuts her new dance song while her husband, Joe, attempts to reach out to his sister for the last time.

8.title: Best Friends for Never

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Jacqueline's conversation with her ex-husband reveals that their daughter, Ashley, is running out of options. Meanwhile, Caroline's daughter, Lauren, comes to a shocking decision about her struggle to lose weight.

9.title: Public Displays of Rejection

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Teresa decides to take a big step forward with her brother, but Kathy is suspicious of Teresa's motives when she attempts to make things right with her. Jacqueline locks herself away following her emotional fallout with Teresa but the two come face to face again when Melissa hosts a party for her radio debut with Ryan Seacrest.

10.title: Temporary Shrinkage

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: Kathy takes her relationship with Rosie to the next level as she hits up the gay bar scene to find her sister a love connection. Teresa and her brother, Joe, go to therapy to discuss their issues but the past comes back to haunt them. Jacqueline and Caroline have a family dinner to decide if Teresa and her husband, Joe, are still invited on their trip to Napa. Meanwhile, Teresa gets a surprise visit from her cousin, Rosie, who is determined to clear her sister's good name.

11.title: Sniff Test

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: Melissa and Joe throw their daughter, Antonia, an over-the-top birthday party that brings Teresa and Jacqueline face to face for an awkward exchange. Kathy hosts a meal for her sister's new love interest. Meanwhile Caroline's son, Albie, works up the nerve to introduce his new cheerleader girlfriend to the family.

12.title: Jersey Side Step

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: Everyone is putting on a show in New Jersey! Melissa polishes up her act with Chris Judd but it's Teresa's daughter, Gia, who threatens to upstage her at the live music festival. Jacqueline's husband, Chris, hits the road with Caroline's sons, Albie and Chris, to sell their BLK water at the Fancy Food Festival in Washington DC, but things go awry when a night of drinking threatens to damage their presentation.

13.title: Sit Down and Man Up

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: While Teresa is concocting the latest product in her growing business empire, Kathy makes her humble start at an old gelato stand in her native town of Patterson. An accusation that Teresa is stealing family recipes for her own financial gain throws ice water on Teresa's reconciliation with Kathy. Meanwhile, Jacqueline's husband, Chris, calls the husbands together for a sit down that exposes feuds and frail friendships, which sets the stage for a trip to Napa that can implode at any second.

14.title: Pack Your Baggage

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: As Hurricane Irene bears down on New Jersey, the Housewives flee to the sunny, golden coastlines of California. With their stilettos, fake tans and dried sausage, they pile into cramped RVs for the road trip to end all road trips. With tensions between Caroline, Jacqueline and Teresa at an all-time high, it's a constant struggle to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Teresa confronts Kathy over her "stolen recipe" accusations and sister-in-law Melissa attempts to show Teresa the error of her ways.

15.title: If This RV Is a Rockin'

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: It's time to hang ten as the Housewives decide to take on California's supreme surfing waves. Jacqueline and Teresa try and see if their friendship can survive, meanwhile Caroline worries for her daughter Lauren, as she reaches her boiling point. Also, Caroline's son Albie shares some breaking news regarding the state of his relationship with his girlfriend.

16.title: Whine Country

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: The Housewives threaten a business meeting in Napa with their horseplay. In a shocking moment of truth, one phone call could change Teresa's life forever.

17.title: Hot Tub of Sour Grapes

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: A relaxing dip in the hot tub turns volatile when Caroline overhears a conversation between Teresa and Kathy. The men try to sort out their issues more amicably but soon get involved with the women's argument.

18.title: Dinasty of Denial

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

18.plot: Kathy visits a college with her daughter Victoria, while Caroline gets her crack at being an oracle on Sirius Radio. Teresa invites Dina Manzo to her Fabellini release party.

19.title: A Bald Canary Sings

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

19.plot: Kathy attempts to make a sweet business deal while Melissa meets with a music industry hot-shot to see if she has the makings of a rock star. It's time again for Kim D's annual Posche Fashion Show, where Teresa discovers a shocking ghost from Melissa's past.

20.title: Strip Down Memory Lane

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

20.plot: Melissa prepares to confront her past as questions about Teresa's involvement in stripper-gate arise among the ladies. Tensions hit a boiling point between Kim D and Joe and Rich. Teresa and Jacqueline's friendship is put to the final test, and in a shocking moment of truth, Joe Gorga decides on the fate of his relationship with his sister.

21.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

21.plot: Part one brings Caroline Manzo, Teresa Giudice, Melissa Gorga and Kathy Wakile to discuss some of the most talked about antics of the season. Lauren Manzo joins to weigh in on the season's drama.

22.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

22.plot: Part two brings Caroline Manzo, Teresa Giudice, Melissa Gorga and Kathy Wakile together again to answer some of viewers' burning questions. Joe Giudice stops by to discuss his behavior.

23.title: Reunion Part 3

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

23.plot: Part three brings together Caroline Manzo, Teresa Giudice, Melissa Gorga and Kathy Wakile. The husbands join in to hash out the season's most dramatic moments.

24.title: Lost Footage

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

24.plot: Bravo's Andy Cohen unveils unseen footage from the season including fun Napa moments and how Jacqueline and Chris fell in love. Check out even more reunion drama including Teresa's explanation of her magazine apologies to the women and behind-the-scenes with Kim D.

1.title: Garden State of Emergency

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: The wives get slammed by Hurricane Sandy, leaving their vacation homes as destroyed as their relationships. More than a year of silence widens the cracks between Teresa, Melissa and Joe. Jacqueline faces her son's autism diagnosis, as Kathy learns the "art of war" from Rosie. Caroline has changed her address, but can't move far enough from the Giudice and Gorga drama. Her shocking offer to Joe Gorga could lead the wives toward reconciliation or an all-out war.

2.title: A Manzo of Her Word

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: After an awkward afternoon with Teresa, Melissa is motivated to move away from her sister-in-law. Kathy's son tests her patience but it's her husband who needs a time out. The Lauritas host a poker night but all bets are off when a surprise from Chris leaves Jacqueline in tears. Caroline and Teresa face off in a heated exchange that puts Caroline in the hot seat.

3.title: It's My Party And I'll Fight If I Want To

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Teresa's father gets admitted into the ICU just in time for her daughter, Gia's, 12th birthday party. Caroline returns to her Franklin Lakes mansion to find it's turned into a pig sty. Meanwhile, Jacqueline checks in with her new friend, Melissa, but can't save her when a little white lie makes Teresa see red!

4.title: Gym Rats

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Crazy is in the air as Teresa heads to the gym to blow off some steam but loses her cool during a run-in with her brother, Joe. Kathy throws a joint birthday bash for her husband, Rich, and daughter, Victoria, but Caroline drops a bomb that causes one guest to completely meltdown. Melissa struggles with a dark secret from her past.

5.title: Everything Is Coming Up Rosie

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Tempers flare between Joe and Melissa over accusations Teresa lobbed (along with her water bottle) at the gym. As Jacqueline deals with a crushing setback with her son, Caroline fears her kids are following too closely in her husband's shoes. Meanwhile, Richie oversteps, sparking the wrath of Kathy and Rosie extends an olive branch to Teresa. But all bets are off when the unpredictable cousins face-off.

6.title: Drinking with the Enemy

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Cheating rumors surface about Melissa, and an awkward exchange between Caroline and her husband unearths new feelings. Teresa and Rosie plan a healing retreat that could bring her face to face with Jacqueline.

7.title: When Joes Collide

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: The housewives pack their bags and head to Lake George to work out their issues. Teresa prepares to confront Jacqueline, while Kathy plays referee on the sidelines. Years of hostility fracture the group when relationship building exercises turn in to a throwdown between the Joes.

8.title: Scum One, Scum All

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: All bets are off when a brawl erupts between the Joes, as Teresa, Melissa and Kathy seethe with anger. Caroline attempts to help bring this family back from the brink of destruction with the help of a professional.

9.title: On Thin Guid-Ice

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Teresa and her brother Joe, along with their spouses get down and dirty with a relationship expert, but Kathy feels left out in the cold. Caroline reveals her own agenda for healing, and everyone is looking to Jacqueline for a final solution.

10.title: Best Frenemies Forever

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: Teresa and Jacqueline meet for a sit-down for the first time in over a year, but things quickly derail. Caroline worries about her children's needs but it's her husband that makes a shocking demand. Melissa and Joe get an offer one of them can't refuse, and Kathy spices up Rosie's love life.

11.title: Children of the Scorned

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: With the adults' relationships on the mend, Joe makes up for lost time with his goddaughter, Gia. Teresa hosts a charity event and confronts Jacqueline about a comment threatening their reconciliation. Meanwhile, Jacqueline makes an impulsive decision that leaves her family worried, but at least Kathy is on her side!

12.title: Hair-Binger of Doom

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: A scandalous article about Melissa's marriage rocks New Jersey. Teresa has her hair product launch. Meanwhile, an encounter with Caroline has Kathy questioning her partnership with Rich.

13.title: Spaghetti Western & Meatballs

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: The Housewives jet off to the Arizona desert to celebrate Melissa's birthday. But Joe rethinks including his sister, Teresa. As Jacqueline tries to mend her relationship with Teresa, Caroline struggles to get her husband to relax. Kathy receives a long-awaited message.

14.title: Horse Whisper to a Scream

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: An unorthodox therapy brings the Housewives up close and personal, leaving Caroline in tears over an admission from her husband. Melissa and Jacqueline face their trust issues and Kathy finally takes a stand. Shockingly, Teresa's husband, Joe, makes a revelation about his current legal issues.

15.title: Zen Things I Hate About You

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: In their final day in the Arizona desert, a high-wire course 30 feet in the air proves to be the ultimate trust test between sister-in-laws Teresa and Melissa. Tensions between Teresa and her brother Joe boil over, forcing Caroline and Kathy to intervene.

16.title: The Blonde Drops a Bombshell

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: Jacqueline faces her fear of public speaking, while Caroline weighs the pros and cons of selling her home. Kathy's cannolis score a promotion and Melissa's singing career attracts a new audience. When a gossip queen resurfaces with a secret, the Gorga-Giudice pact is put to the test.

17.title: Hair We Go Again

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: The heat is on for Caroline's boys as they open their new restaurant and face their harshest critic yet. Meanwhile, Melissa travels to Orlando for a test of her own: a live radio performance that could reignite her music career. Back in NJ, both Teresa and Jacqueline face attacks on their integrity as the opening of a new boutique brings them face to face with their enemies.

18.title: Salon Farewell

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

18.plot: The grand opening party takes a distressing turn when a new face becomes involved in a confrontation with the Giudice-Gorga clan. Teresa wants to clear her name, but harsh accusations leave everyone wondering if she's really behind rumors about Melissa's marriage. Kathy, Jacqueline and Caroline try to focus on their own families, while struggling to repair the damage that has been done...

19.title: Reunion: Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

19.plot: During the 90-minute Reunion Part I, everyone's favorite Garden State ladies, and visits from Joe Giudice, Joe Gorga and Kathy's sister, Rosie, come together to discuss some of this season's most talked about moments and reflect back on the antics from the season. Dr. Venus Nicolino, "Dr. V," also drops by to see where relationships stand since the cast's trip to Lake George.

20.title: Reunion: Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

20.plot: On an emotionally charged Reunion Part II, Teresa and Joe open up about the indictment charges they are faced with; Rosie candidly shares her experience on the show, and the rest of the ladies discuss their overall sentiments on this season.

21.title: The Real Housewives Tell All: Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

21.plot: Tune in for never-before-seen footage of everyone's favorite Garden State ladies in a two-part "The Real Housewives of New Jersey Tell All." From extravagant events to several bizarre antics, you don't want to miss the lost footage from this past season. Part 1 of 2.

22.title: The Real Housewives Tell All: Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

22.plot: Tune in for never-before-seen footage of everyone's favorite Garden State ladies in a two-part "The Real Housewives of New Jersey Tell All." From extravagant events to several bizarre antics, you don't want to miss the lost footage from this past season. Part 2 of 2.

1.title: What a Difference a Plea Makes

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Teresa Giudice and her husband, Joe, fight to keep their family intact as they embark on a very public legal battle for their freedom. Fortunately, Teresa has support from her sister-in-law, Melissa Gorga, after resolving a long time family feud, and veteran housewife Dina Manzo, Teresa's oldest friend who is dealing with a public divorce. Joining in the chaos is Melissa's longtime friend Amber Marchese, a breast cancer survivor, as well as identical twin sisters, Nicole Napolitano and Teresa Aprea. Sparks fly almost immediately when everyone gets together for a ...

2.title: O, Christmas Tre

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Melissa tries to keep Christmas traditions alive, despite living in a rental home, while Dina feels more alone than ever as her daughter Lexi applies for college. Amber, on the other hand, isn't ready to let go of her precious children just yet and becomes consumed with home safety, while Teresa Aprea decides it's time for her son, Giovanni, to join the family empire - interning at his father's restaurant. Meanwhile, Teresa Giudice's legal woes still hang heavy over her family's head as she struggles to keep things normal for her girls and vows to Joe that this will ...

3.title: Trash-Talking

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Joe and Melissa are hoping to rake in the money with their new business - a state of the art trash truck. Meanwhile, Teresa focuses on her dessert line, Fabilicious, and invites friends and family over to try out her new recipes. When the twins hear that someone has started a rumor about Nicole, it becomes clear that things are about to get messy.

4.title: A Hairy Situation

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Nicole and her firefighter boyfriend, Bobby, decide to throw a "First Responders" themed costume party together. The party kicks off hot and heavy as Dina finds a hunky young man she may be interested in. But soon enough, the "First Responders Party" turns into a five-alarm fire when Nicole confronts Amber about the rumor she's been spreading

5.title: One Flew Over the Chicken's Nest

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Tempers are still fiery as the First Responder's party comes to a dramatic conclusion. Amber's husband Jim goes on the offensive with Teresa A, while Nicole demands loyalty from her boyfriend Bobby. Dina tries to warm up to a new man in her life, but her feelings towards her ex still flicker within. Melissa and Amber have a sitdown to hash out just who started the rumor heard round the Jersey grapevine.

6.title: The Family Business

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Melissa and Joe strive to take their new age garbage business to the next level. Rosie introduces her girlfriend to the family. Amber turns to her own family for support, until a phone call from Nicole changes everything.

7.title: Roses Are Red, Dina Is Blue

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Roses are the flowers of choice in the Garden State as the ladies celebrate Valentine's Day in their own unique ways. Dina eats chocolates alone and contemplates divorce, Teresa hunkers down to save her struggling businesses, Melissa tries to woo her husband to spend more time with her, and Nicole struggles through an awkward family dinner where her boyfriend, Bobby, is given the third degree. And in a shocking turn of events, Victoria Gotti reveals a scandalous rumor to Amber and Teresa that could shake the group's foundation to its core.

8.title: Guilt Trip

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: As news spreads about a possible plea deal in Teresa's court case, Dina and Melissa plan a surprise getaway to cheer their friend up in her most desperate time. Meanwhile, Amber and Nicole's fragile reconciliation takes an unwanted detour when Amber starts texting nasty insults to Nicole's boyfriend Bobby. Teresa and her husband Joe make a legal decision that will decide their fate and change their lives forever.

9.title: There Will Be Bloodwork

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: The ladies each deal with some monumental life changes. Dina says goodbye to her long-time assistant Luke, while Teresa and her husband Rino tackle a medical scare. Meanwhile, the Giudices strive to live a normal life amidst the cloud of their guilty plea and Amber receives startling news from her doctor.

10.title: The Day of Jacqueline

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: "Fugetabout" the Jersey snow as Dina, Melissa and the twins travel to the Sunshine State for a little bonding time. It's all in good fun until a nasty secret Dina holds about the twins' family threatens to derail the trip. Meanwhile, back in Jersey, Amber awaits news about whether her cancer has returned, and Teresa faces the new realities of her financial situation. Plus, Jacqueline returns and attempts to confront Teresa about her past.

11.title: Gators and Haters

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: The trip to Florida continues as the brewing tension between Jim, Bobby and Dina erupts into a head. Meanwhile in New Jersey, Teresa struggles with how to respond to Jacqueline's texts, and Rosie's love life hits rocky waters.

12.title: Pack Your Bags and Get Out!

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: The conflict in Florida heats up as Jim has a difference of opinion with Dina, Melissa and the twins as the shocking rumor about the twins' family is revealed. Back in Jersey, Teresa and Joe feel the weight of their legal situation and plan a getaway to New York City, while their estranged friends Chris and Jacqueline struggle to keep the spice in their relationship.

13.title: Sorry, Not Sorry

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: Back from their explosive trip to Florida, Teresa and Rino plan a tasting party to launch their new restaurant, but several names are conspicuously absent from the guest list - Teresa G. and Amber. With her Ladybug event only weeks away, Dina takes it upon herself to get Teresa to apologize to the twins for spreading the rumor, but getting Teresa to apologize could be a fool's errand. Meanwhile, Melissa questions Amber about her home life with Jim, and Nicole meets Jacqueline for the first time.

14.title: Judgment Day

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: As Dina's Ladybug Charity event fast approaches, simmering tension between Teresa and Teresa over the Rino rumors threatens to derail the festivities. Meanwhile, Melissa and Joe break ground on their dream home, and Amber loses her hair again, but this time for a good cause. Finally, after pleading guilty to multiple fraud charges, Teresa and Joe Giudice learn their fate in federal court.

15.title: Secrets Revealed Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: During a bonding trip to Atlantic City the ladies of NJ bare it all. Joe Giudice takes on a gamble of his own in babysitting mischievous Milania. Kathy and Teresa get into a war of words when Teresa takes offense to Kathy's Christmas gift.

16.title: Reunion Part One

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: The ladies of the Garden State reunite with host Andy Cohen to discuss everything that went down in season six.

17.title: Reunion Part Two

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: The reunion continues as the men of Jersey join Andy Cohen and The Housewives. Joe and Teresa Giudice struggle with the death of Joe's father, facing jail time and their money woes. Joe Gorga defends his relationship with his sister, Teresa, after Jim insults them. A true divide is evident between old friends when Jim and Bobby go head to head about everything that went down this season.

18.title: Reunion Part Three

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

18.plot: The three-part reunion comes to a shocking and emotional conclusion, as the Victoria Gotti rumor pits Jim against everyone, and Teresa A. is not ready to let Teresa G. off the hook. And finally, after six seasons, is this Teresa's final goodbye?

19.title: Secrets Revealed Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

19.plot: Dina gathers everyone for some spiritual guidance, but Teresa gets more than she bargained for when her legal issues are called into question. Plus, Jim's ex-wife asks Amber to babysit her pet pig. Milania misbehaves and lets her parents know who's boss.

0.title: Sneak Peek

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.title: Jingle Bells and Prison Cells

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Melissa spreads her entrepreneurial wings as she breaks ground on her new boutique despite her husband Joe's desire to keep her at home. Jacqueline catches with her close friends Dolores and Siggy, and later hosts a holiday cocktail party where she shares a secret message that she is surprised to receive. Finally, after nearly a year in prison, Teresa returns home to her family just in time for Christmas.

2.title: A Very Hairy Christmas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: It's Christmas in Jersey! Melissa hosts the Gorga/Giudice Christmas Eve Dinner and reunites with Teresa for the first time in a year. Later, Jacqueline gets a surprise call from Teresa as Dolores attempts to negotiate peace between the two ex-BFFs. Meanwhile, Joe Giudice and Gia are at odds over her decision to spend New Year's Eve away from the family.

3.title: Leopard Is the New Black

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Jacqueline surprises Teresa by showing up on her doorstep wanting answers. Meanwhile, Melissa hits a road block with her opinionated new business partner. Later, Siggy throws Dolores a true Jersey Birthday Party to give her a confidence boost, but Kathy and Rosie end up feeling on the outs.

4.title: A Life to Envy

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: The ladies of New Jersey are working it with Melissa's boutique, Envy, officially opening for business, Teresa recording her audio book and Jacqueline and her husband, Chris, making headway on their new business venture. Meanwhile, Dolores and her daughter, Gabby, discuss veterinary school and later, Siggy confronts Teresa about tabloid rumors.

5.title: The Bravoholic Edition

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Dinner Interrupted

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: The honeymoon is over when the Lauritas host the Giudices for dinner and old tensions between the ladies quickly boil over. Elsewhere, Siggy's kids confront her with shocking news, Dolores starts the journey toward financial independence, and Melissa's kids walk in Fashion Week. With everything going on, Teresa and Melissa find themselves growing closer.

7.title: Swimming with the Gefilte Fishes

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Free at last! After being on home confinement for over a month, Teresa says goodbye to her ankle bracelet and the ladies plan a trip to celebrate. Siggy returns to her religious roots and hosts a family dinner, and Dolores makes progress on renovating her home. Meanwhile, Melissa confronts Jacqueline about involving Joe Gorga in her fight with Teresa.

8.title: All Bets Are Off Part One

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: The ladies head to a spa to celebrate Teresa's first weekend of freedom since removing her ankle bracelet. Siggy reveals new information about her husband's shaky past, and Melissa struggles with her new business venture. Meanwhile, Jacqueline reaches a breaking point with her son. Later, Teresa and Jacqueline decide if they are better off as friends or foes.

9.title: All Bets Are Off

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Melissa gets Antonia ready for a ''daddy-daughter'' dance; Jacqueline hosts a night of poker sending Rosie over the edge; a dodgy character interrupts Teresa's book-launch party; Siggy helps Dolores cope with her loss of her dog.

10.title: Driving Miss Siggy

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: Teresa has a book signing where a few unexpected visitors show up. Then, after reaching out to Siggy for advice, Melissa decides to have a family dinner to get her marriage back on track. Meanwhile, Jacqueline gets an inside look to her husband's new business venture.

11.title: Cut the Cancer Out

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: Jacqueline gets choked up over a special proposal; Teresa's blood boils during a family reunion with cousins Kathy and Rosie; Melissa suggests a group trip to Vermont to give Teresa a vacation before her husband goes to prison; Dolores gets serious.

12.title: Rage on My Ass

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: The group drives to a mountaintop resort in Vermont; Jacqueline and Teresa's friend, Robyn, get into a scuffle in the van; Dolores and Siggy struggle to keep the peace; Jacqueline and Robyn get into a fiery argument at the bonfire.

14.title: The Importance of Being Family

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: The ladies are licking their wounds after the tumultuous Vermont trip. Meanwhile, Melissa receives bad news about her boutique and Jacqueline's husband, Chris, reveals shocking news about his family. Teresa leans on her faith to help get her through her husband going to prison.

15.title: Nama'Stay Away from Me

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: Tempers flare as Dolores throws a housewarming party. Melissa delegates for her upcoming Fashion Show and Teresa recovers from her first week without Joe. To everyone's surprise, Jacqueline and Dolores find themselves at odds over one phone call.

16.title: And Then There Were Four

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: Stakes are high for Melissa as she single-handedly hosts her first annual Envy Fashion Show and tries to prove her boutique's legitimacy. Meanwhile, Dolores surprises her ex-husband, Frank, and Teresa considers her financial future. Later, it's time to get everything out in the open as the ladies meet for lunch. Siggy plays mediator to Jacqueline, Teresa, and Melissa, and ultimately Jacqueline makes for a great escape.

17.title: Reunion Part I

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: Tensions are high as Melissa and Teresa face Jacqueline for the first time since their group lunch. Dolores reminisces about the good old days when the group was in harmony, and Siggy reveals more information about her hysterectomy. Teresa makes an alarming accusation that shocks the group.

18.title: Reunion Part II

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

18.plot: The group is divided from part one of the reunion, and there's more drama to be dealt with. Joe Gorga and Chris Laurita join to discuss Teresa's serious accusation, and Dolores is the only one that keeps the group from exploding. Jacqueline writes off a relationship, but Siggy's wish for the group comes true.

0.title: How They Got Here

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

0.plot: From bubbies to chuckies, Danielle to Dina, here's a look at 7 seasons of #RHONJ.

1.title: Shaddy Beach

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Teresa struggles with the loss of her mother, and her friends plan a weekend getaway to Boca Raton, Fla.; Dolores' ex-husband moves back in; Siggy introduces Margaret Josephs to the group; tensions flare when Danielle Staub makes her return.

2.title: Let Them Eat Cake

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: After an explosive fight, Siggy and Dolores align themselves against Teresa and Melissa; the rift between Margaret and Siggy turns ugly; Dolores deals with the challenges of having her ex-husband and their son, Frankie, under the same roof.

3.title: The Apology

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Margaret throws a launch party for her purse line, but Siggy and Dolores refuse to attend; Teresa begins to work on a new book; Joe makes a business decision without consulting Melissa; Frank and Dolores spar over the best way to handle Frankie.

4.title: The Public Shaming of Melissa

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: As the restaurant opening approaches, tensions mount between Melissa and Teresa; Siggy throws a cocktail party, but her anger comes back to haunt Melissa; Danielle shares a secret with Teresa that could destroy Teresa's friendship with Dolores.

5.title: Not Over It

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Dolores begins to get serious about her new boyfriend; Margaret starts developing a shoe line; Teresa, Melissa, and Joe prepare for the Gorga's tasting party; Melissa and Teresa get into a huge fight, threatening the progress of the restaurant.

6.title: Growing Up Jersey

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Teresa takes her daughters and her father on vacation to Puerto Rico, but the fun quickly turns into family turmoil; Margaret and Dolores face off; Siggy gets hormone therapy; Melissa and Joe argue over how to parent Antonia.

7.title: A Retreat to Remember

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: As Teresa and Dolores try to repair their fragile friendship, Dolores drops a bomb on Teresa regarding Danielle; Siggy hosts a Women's Empowerment Retreat; Margaret and Melissa worry they will feel the wrath of Siggy again.

8.title: Walking on Broken Glass

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: While at Siggy's retreat, Margaret opens up about her relationship with her step-children, and Teresa talks about her resentment toward Joe; Melissa and Margaret plan a fun surprise; Siggy and Dolores confront Teresa about a rumor.

9.title: When Chairs Fly

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Teresa, Melissa, Margaret, and Danielle square off with Dolores, Siggy and Kim D. at the annual Posche Fashion Show; Teresa confronts Kim D. face to face about the cheating rumors; the women wonder whether they should go to Italy together.

10.title: Meltdown in Milan

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: Trying to fix their fractured friendships, the women take a trip to Milan, but rising tensions lead to an explosive fight that may divide them forever; back in New Jersey, Joe hosts a guys night.

11.title: Fauxpology

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: Still in Milan, Margaret tries to mend her friendship with Siggy; Margaret and Danielle go to a shoe factory to develop Margaret's shoe line; Dolores and Melissa have a heart to heart; in New Jersey, Joe checks in with the Guidice kids.

12.title: Ain't No Misbehaving

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: The group manages to return to Jersey in one piece and it is officially back to reality. Teresa models in a photo shoot for her upcoming book and Dolores takes her son Frankie on a college tour. Later, the kitchen isn't the only thing heating up as the Gorgas prepare for their restaurant opening when Teresa and Melissa go head-to-head over a business decision. Finally, Danielle receives some closure she has been wanting for over 9 years.

13.title: Prisoners, Proposals and Parties

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: Teresa visits her husband in prison with a plan to demand an apology. Dolores receives advice from her ex-husband about her boyfriend, while Danielle's boyfriend decides to take their relationship to the next level. Later, Margaret celebrates her 50th birthday and Siggy has a mishap that makes some of the women question her honesty. As the ladies reunite for one last time, unexpected alliances are formed that send shockwaves through New Jersey.

14.title: Reunion, Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: The ladies of Jersey come back together to hash out their differences, relive their funniest moments and reflect on the loss of Teresa's mom. But the biggest surprises comes when Kim D arrives on set, forcing the ladies to take sides and pushing Teresa to her limit.

15.title: Reunion, Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: Teresa accuses Kim D of being a Madame, Danielle and Dolores' face off, and the whole cast revisits their epic trip to Italy where one comment about Hitler changed the nature of their friendships forever.

16.title: Reunion Secrets Revealed

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: Check out funny and surprising never-before-seen moments from the ladies of the Garden State: a Gorga/Giudice Easter celebration gets completely out of control, Margaret and Siggy show surprising BFF potential at a photo shoot, Danielle crosses the line in the Gorga's Restaurant bathroom, Gia reveals her true feelings about her dad returning home, and more.

-1.title: Picking Sides

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey (TV Series 2009– )

-1.plot: The ladies are licking their wounds after the tumultuous Vermont trip. Meanwhile, Melissa receives bad news about her boutique and Jacqueline's husband, Chris, reveals shocking news about his family. Teresa leans on her faith to help get her through her husband going to prison.

imdb.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
plot: Another installment of Bravo's "The Real Housewives" reality show. In this series, they focus on housewives living in New Jersey.
